doc.field: Proclamations: "Captain Oliver Law and Nelson Mandela Day," Apr 24, 1988, Manhattan; "Oliver Law and ALB Day," Nov 21, 1987, Chicago Typescripts: "The 25th Anniversary of the Spanish Civil War"; "1979 Bibliography of the Spanish Civil War" Flyers: "The Good Fight"; "Malraux-Hemingway: Embattled Spain," symposium, Boston College (1990) Periodicals: Political Affairs(Aug 1986), re: "International Brigades against War and Fascism 1936-1986" Copy of letter re: planning of VALB Dinner; dispute over invited speaker Dr. Goodlet's public remarks on Zionism, and protest again inviting him from Zionist members of VALB, 1979 [from Ruth Davidow?] Clippings re: Bill Bailey; Alvah Bessie; Bill McCarthy; Spanish/Latin American poetry of Spanish Civil War (SCW) period; "To Die in Madrid," 1966 documentary; reviews of SCW-themed books
